titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the small refiner exception to the oil depletion deduction.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the small refiner exception to the oil depletion deduction.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to change the average daily refinery limitation concerning the oil depletion deduction from 50,000 to 75,000 barrels-per-day.
